item.description:
While the weather's nice, let's take advantage of it at one of the nicest bars in Harvard Square. Come for after work drinks and conversation at Noir.

This small, upscale bar is a nice venue for new and old members to meet.

While we won't have a designated area for the group, I'm going to be hanging out on the patio. Feel free to join me, or at least take a second to introduce yourself when you arrive, but then please feel free to grab a drink and make new friends.

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: End of Summer Drinks at Noir
